10.10.0.254 = 00-10-7b-e7-fa-ef I need to send a frame to 172.16.0.10, but it is outside my network and I don't know the MAC address of my gateway (10.10.0.254). If your IP address is 10.10.0.254, please tell 10.10.0.1(00-0d-88-c7-9a-24). I am 10.10.0.254. So I respond with my MAC address 00-10-7b-e7-fa-ef. I will store 10.10.0.254 and 00-10-7b-e7-fa-ef in my ARP Cache. I can now send the frame with a packet to 172.16.0.10 with the MAC address 00-10-7b-e7-fa-ef. I will forward the packet in this frame based on a route in my routing table. [I can now send the frame with a packet to 172.16.0.10 with the MAC address 00-10-7b-e7-fa-ef.]]>
